EmailTemplate.subject: A Message From Our CEO - Paul Maritz
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I would like to invite you to join me in Singapore this month for our first Asia Pacific Summit. I am very excited to speak with you about creating modern software companies. I anticipate that this event will be insightful and informative, with two full days of workshops and in-depth discussions. The technology industry is experiencing a major change. The wide-scale move to cloud computing is transforming the ways that infrastructure and applications will be built and used. Enterprises require a new generation of increasingly mobile and data-centric applications to drive new business value. At our first Asia Pacific Summit, held on October 23-24, you will have the unique opportunity to become part of this extraordinary movement. Joined by my team of senior industry experts and key customers, I will be sharing the mission for Pivotal – to enable your company to build great software and create true business value. Visit our event website <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/> and learn more about how to register <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/register.php>. I am looking forward to connecting with you in person and hope you'll be able to attend.
Best Regards,
Paul Maritz CEO, Pivotal
